channel.title: Anyone have a command for this?-PI-
channel.description: this is probably very simple -.- but i've never done this kind of command before, does anyhave have a command that when used, brings u to 1hp, and actually shows the hitsplat? i have a simple command but all it does is take away the hp, not the hitsplat and id like to have the hitsplat as well, does anyone have this? thanks in advance - L0lc0pt3r

item.title: Anyone have a command for this?-PI-
item.dc:creator: @l0lc0pt3r l0lc0pt3r
item.description:
@l0lc0pt3r wrote:

would be helpful if i had this “heal” command l0l. can someone that actually is able to help post -.-

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have a command for this?-PI-

item.title: Anyone have a command for this?-PI-
item.dc:creator: @Resent Resent
item.description:
@Resent wrote:

[quote=“l0lc0pt3r, post:3, topic:412487”][quote author=Demon6994 link=topic=513748.msg3730036#msg3730036 date=1314560711]
I fail. Sorry. XD Who wants a command that takes away your health? Kinda defeats the purpose. >.> Jsyk.
[/quote]
uhh…why post if you have nothing reasonable to say? and its for people using DH so they can use the effect. #facepalm[/quote]

Try looking for the “heal” command in commands.java you’ll probably find something that represents adding on +restorehp or something like that with a +[number here] try changing that “+” to a “-” see if that works.

Read full topic
